body_html: this is a weird python install. Under Python 3.6, _C.so shouldn't be called _C.so, but actually be called: _C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so. That's what Python expects from it's extensions.
body_text: this is a weird python install. Under Python 3.6, _C.so shouldn't be called _C.so, but actually be called: _C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so. That's what Python expects from it's extensions.
body: this is a weird python install. Under Python 3.6, _C.so shouldn't be called _C.so, but actually be called: `_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so`. That's what Python expects from it's extensions.
